TestList.name: test1
TestList.description: Copy all application from a source repository to a target repository.

TestList.name: test2
TestList.description: Copy all business process from a source repository to a target repository.

TestList.name: test3
TestList.description: Link each application to corresponding business processes in target repository as done in source repository.

TestList.name: test4
TestList.description: Copy all business capability from a source repository to a target repository.

TestList.name: test5
TestList.description: Link each application to corresponding business capabilities in target repository including inter objects as done in source repository.

TestList.name: test6
TestList.description: Copy all software technology from a source repository to a target repository.

TestList.name: test7
TestList.description: Link each application to corresponding software technology in target repository as done in source repository.

TestList.name: test8
TestList.description: Delete all link between applications and business processes from target repository

TestList.name: test9
TestList.description: Delete all link between applications and business capabilities including interobjects from target repository

TestList.name: test10
TestList.description: Delete all link between applications and software technologies from target repository

TestList.name: test11
TestList.description: Delete all existing software technology from target repository

TestList.name: test12
TestList.description: Delete all existing business capability from target repository

TestList.name: test13
TestList.description: Delete all existing business process from target repository

TestList.name: test14
TestList.description: Delete all existing application from target repository

TestList.name: test15
TestList.description: Copy all audit connected to at least one audit activity, copy all corresponding audit themes, audit activities, work papers, test sheets, questions/audits, answers/audits, audit themes (for audit activities) and findings. Make corresponding links between all copied elements

TestList.name: test16
TestList.description: Delete all links concerning elements of audits. Delete all audit, audit themes, audit activities, work papers, test sheets, questions/audits, answers/audits and findings.
